## DoD Checklist (Definition of Done)
### General
- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Branch/commits follow conventions
- [ ] No debug leftovers (`var_dump`, `die`, console spam)
- [ ] No secrets committed (no real passwords/tokens; no `config.php`)
- [ ] Manual testing done for main flow

### Backend/API (if touched)
- [ ] Prepared statements used (PDO)
- [ ] Server-side validation added/updated
- [ ] Authorization checks server-side
- [ ] JSON response format consistent

### Database (if touched)
- [ ] `database/schema.sql` updated or change documented
- [ ] Required indexes/constraints added

### Frontend/UI (if touched)
- [ ] UI matches `/docs/UI_GUIDE.md`
- [ ] Loading / empty / error states exist
- [ ] Responsive check done (mobile + desktop)

### Docs (if needed)
- [ ] Setup/demo docs updated if behavior changed
